BusinessName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: HEART SOCIETY OF GASTON COUNTY INC

IRS990.Desc: HEALTH AND PUBLIC EDUCATION, PROFESSIONAL EDUCATION AND TRAINING, AND COMMUNITY SERVICES. THE PURPOSE OF THESE ACTIVITIES IS TO BRING AWARENESS AND PROMOTE HEART HEALTHY LIFESTYLES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: SALES TAX REFUND
SALES TAX REFUND
THE TREASURER REVIEWS FORM 990 AND AUDIT AND EITHER
APPROVES OR REQUIRES REVISIONS BEFORE FINAL ACCEPTANCE.
BOARD MEMBERS ARE PROVIDED A COPY OF FORM 990 UPON
REQUEST
MEMBERS OF BOARD ARE REQUIRED TO SIGN A CONFLICT OF
INTEREST PLEDGE UPON TAKING OFFICE. CONFLICT OF
INTEREST ISSUES, IF ANY, ARE DISCUSSED AT BOARD OF
DIRECTOR MEETINGS.
ALL KEY EMPLOYEES ARE EVALUATED FOR PERFORMANCE
ANNUALLY AND COMPENSATION IS BASED ON EVALUATION
AS WELL AS FINANCIAL CONDITION OF THE ORGANIZATION.
THIS EVALUATION AND COMPENSATION PROCESS IS CONDUCTED
BY THE PERSONNEL COMMITTEE WHICH RECOMMENDS TO THE
EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE AND THEN TO THE FULL BOARD
THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE FUNCTIONS AS THE AUDIT
COMMITTEE AND IS RESPONSIBLE FOR THE AUDIT AND
RECOMMENDS THE HIRING OF THE AUDITOR TO THE BOARD
THE HEART SOCIETY WILL PROVIDE ITS GOVERNING DOCUMENTS
CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY, AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS
TO ANYONE IMMEDIATELY UPON REQUEST.
ALL KEY EMPLOYEES ARE EVALUATED FOR PERFORMANCE
ANNUALLY AND COMPENSATION IS BASED ON EVALUATION
AS WELL AS FINANCIAL CONDITION OF THE ORGANIZATION.
THIS EVALUATION AND COMPENSATION PROCESS IS CONDUCTED
BY THE PERSONNEL COMMITTEE WHICH RECOMMENDS TO THE
EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE AND THEN TO THE FULL BOARD.
